name: Trojan Invasion
description:
This game was made within 3 hours during the Trijam #207: The 3 hour game jam.

Trojan Invasion is a 2D action game where the player play as the role of cyber security entity destroying any Trojan and or virus by well timed Elctro-Shockwave.

Controls
- Arrow Key / WASD


Credits:

BGM: Kayugames

SFX: Jdwasabi, Shapeforms Audio Free Sound Effects
